name: OnRoadsBetween
blurb: A multiplayer horror game set in 1980s New Zealand. You and your friends set off on a journey to get from the top of the country to the bottom, collecting evidence of the paranormal activity happening along the way. Grab your camera, your highschool car, a couple mates and just go. The game is in active development. (Steam page coming soon)

name: OurExams
blurb: A website designed to host all of the exam files which NZQA took down. A new update is in the works, making studying online 10 times easier and 100 times as convienent. (Click to visit website)
